songs.title: Intro
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Hahahahahahahahahaha
Ayo, DJ Red, turn the motherfucking beat up
Hello juggalos, my name is King Gordy Cobain the Dead
Juggalettes, I am the king of horrorcore (Hahahahaha)
And welcome to my mixtape (Hahahahaha)
Pass me that blunt

[Verse]
Yo
It will take me approximately 20 minutes to kick the senses
But when I'm finished, millions will die in an instant
Existence has ended from those kids to that bitch you chill with
Their ribs ripped out of their skin is getting in bits
The scent is sick, quick bitch get an incense
Sick shit I live this, I’ve been to prison
I live with mental disfigure their women
So you won't think to sleep with them
They say they mentally gifted but to me they just have a mental illness
Screaming lord forgive them
Saving their inner spirits
The Devil makes an interference
Now they're fighting each other, there’s lightning and thunder
Can't you hear it?
It sounds like his brain is damaged on some severe shit
Takes a blade and stabs his dick, says he pierced it
A cage of animals man, see what I have to deal with
My face is flammable, when I spit you hear it searing
Tongue explodes, lips melting, I am the illest
Gorillas, inhale it, can't you feel it
You fear him, you pretend to be one of his children
You have eaten fruit which was forbidden
Please listen, suicide is senseless when you're lying stiff
And your wife is getting her insides filled with dick

[Outro]
King Gordy Cobain the Dead!
DJ Red, welcome to my mixtape!
I am the king of horrorcore!
